entry.title: Announcing the Statoshi fork
entry.summary: Jameson Lopp, a Bitcoin Core developer has created a fork of the platform which outputs statistics to StatsD. The fork was created in order to gain insight into what messages and requests a node is processing. Users can access the fork by visiting coinchomp.com/2014/05/07/announcing-statoshi-realtime-bitcoin-node-statistics/. Feedback on the new feature is appreciated from users.
